attributes.action: Ensure there is no second referendum on EU membership and respect democracy.
attributes.additional_details: Some of our politicians have no respect for the vote that was taken, had the vote been the same majority for remain as it was for leave then I would have accepted it, we would stay in the EU and that’s democracy. I don’t believe there would have been a big debate in Parliament about respecting the 48% of people who voted leave, no deal would have been done to respect our concerns, MP’s wouldn’t be going to Brussels to do a deal on a soft remain, we would have been told you lost get over it.
attributes.background: All we have heard from remainer MP’s and parts of the media is how leave voters didn’t know what they were voting for. I knew exactly what I was voting for and I’m not zenaphobic, racist or stupid. I respect those that voted to remain it’s time for them to respect those who don’t share their view.
